backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining lease listings, requests, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD operations using Map/Set state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing two frontend feature changes and the related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their purpose in the UI and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router with hash history, global layout, theme provider, and routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Badge showing the authenticated user’s name using profile and identity hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to save their profile name before using the app.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Route guard that blocks access for unauthenticated users and shows a sign‑in prompt.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Incomi: Displays incoming lease requests for owners with status update actions and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LeaseO: Modal dialog for creating or editing lease listings with validation for UUID and split ratios.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OwnerO: Shows owner lease listings with options to create, edit, or archive listings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with top navigation, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with links, social icons, and branding info.
frontend/src/components/leases/EmptyStat: Generic empty-state card displaying a title and description.
frontend/src/components/leases/LeaseList: Card component showing summary details of a lease listing with a link to view more.
frontend/src/components/marketing/GetUni: Promotional section linking to Unity Network mobile app downloads with store badges.
frontend/src/components/media/YouTubeSho: Displays a grid of embedded YouTube Shorts with titles and descriptions plus a link to the UnityNodesIO channel.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Renders the top navigation bar with links, login status, mobile sheet menu, and logo.
frontend/src/components/requests/SubmitL: Provides a form for authenticated users to submit lease requests and handles submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/requests/TenantR: Shows the tenant’s submitted lease requests in a table with status and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity to expose authentication state, principal info, and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity provider and hook to manage identity loading, login flow, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseListings.ts: Fetches active and owner-specific lease listings using the actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseRequests.ts: Handles submitting lease requests and fetching tenant/owner requests plus updating their status.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerDashboard.ts: Provides mutations to create, update, and archive lease listings while invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile using the backend actor with proper query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Authenticated dashboard with tabs for offers, incoming requests, and user requests plus a YouTube Shorts section.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains app workflow with step cards, educational content, and YouTube Shorts, including external UnityNodes link.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero, features, and link to browse lease listings plus app promo section.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed info for a single lease listing with loading states, not‑found handling, and request submission form.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseListingsPage.tsx: Shows active lease listings with sorting, loading skeletons, empty state, and listing cards.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 page displaying an error message and a button to return home.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters from query or hash, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, constraints, issues, and features for building an ICP-hosted site for UNO/ULO lease listings.
